description:
When Kohana begins producing destructive Light of Arte, she is recommended to drop out of school. Teika and the others do everything they can to find a way to save Kohana, but they`re unable to find any clues. Overwhelmed by the reality of her situation, she sees a vision of her mother who aspired to climb the Scala Artista. Kohana desperately begins arranging flowers despite being told not to, and--
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Sleeping Princess of the Frozen Forest
